rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks, put a critical counter on it. If it already had a critical counter on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead. [i](If it would deal damage, remove a critical counter and it deals twice that much instead.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if sources you control dealt 7 or more damage this turn, create a token that’s a copy of Unyielding Conviction.
